<script>
(function(){
  const GA_ID = 'G-DVT1KMSK18';
  const GA_ENDPOINT = 'https://www.google-analytics.com/g/collect';
  const sendEvent = (name, params) => {
    const base = {
      v: '2',
      tid: GA_ID,
      cid: localStorage.getItem('_ga_cid') || (function() {
        const id = crypto.randomUUID();
        try { localStorage.setItem('_ga_cid', id); } catch(e) {}
        return id;
      })(),
      sid: Date.now().toString(36),
      dl: location.href,
      dt: document.title,
      dr: document.referrer,
      sr: screen.width + 'x' + screen.height,
      ul: navigator.language
    };
    const query = new URLSearchParams(Object.assign(base, params));
    query.append('en', name);
    navigator.sendBeacon(GA_ENDPOINT + '?' + query.toString());
  };
  let sent = false;
  const trackPageView = () => {
    if (sent) return;
    sent = true;
    sendEvent('page_view', {});
  };
  const queueIdle = () => {
    if ('requestIdleCallback' in window) {
      requestIdleCallback(trackPageView, { timeout: 5000 });
    } else {
      setTimeout(trackPageView, 2000);
    }
  };
  window.addEventListener('load', queueIdle, { once: true });
  ['scroll','keydown','pointerdown'].forEach((eventName) => {
    window.addEventListener(eventName, trackPageView, { once: true, passive: true });
  });
  window.addEventListener('pageshow', (e) => {
    if (e.persisted) { sent = false; trackPageView(); }
  });
})();
</script>
